subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer’s demanding travel schedule will preclude Darren Cahill from working with the 13-time Grand Slam champion, meaning the former No. 1 player is still without a full-time coach.
snippet: Roger Federer’s demanding travel schedule will preclude Darren Cahill from working with the 13-time Grand Slam champion, meaning the former No. 1 player is still without a full-time coach.
